name: The Growing Zombie Problem
description:
Made for Kenney Jam 2022 with the Theme : Growth

In this FPS Zombie Action game (Made for Kenney's Game Jam 2022), survive the zombie, and shoot them down before they grow big and eat you alive!

Use WASD to move. Left click to Fire. Right Click to Zoom in. Shift to sprint. Left ctrl to crouch. 1 and 2 to Switch Weapons

Download the zip file, unzip and double click "The Growing Zombie Problem.exe".

Have Fun!

This is my first ever official Game Jam submission, and first ever Game I have completed. Thank you for playing this and please do leave comments!
